ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Quests with KOS faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, though charm no longer works for SS armor you can use it for the choker quest. ... Sneak still works for SS armor. The problem is the Laochmaster that
ygData.messageBody:
>Has anyone successfully charm/sneak/invis their way in to some Kael or SS
>armor?

Yes, though charm no longer works for SS armor you can use it for the choker
quest.

>and hope that
>someday I can get the SS armor if I get the gems.
>
>Tzeetch
>

Sneak still works for SS armor. The problem is the Laochmaster that converts
helmets is right on the teleport spot to the quest hall, and he sees invis,
so you would need to kill him if you are KoS. Probly not too hard (blue to a
60th), but I wouldn't really know.
